issue.title: Sparse Scenary in proposed qualifier and VRC scenes

content.raw:
I created a pull-request into the gazebo_models repo for your model: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/14/added-maurices-brick-wall/diff

I also added anistropic filtering for the texture in order to maintain sharp textures when viewing the wall at an angle (with the default trilinear filtering they get extremely blurred starting at a viewing angle of ~45 deg)
content.html:
I created a pull-request into the gazebo_models repo for your model: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/14/added-maurices-brick-wall/diff

I also added anistropic filtering for the texture in order to maintain sharp textures when viewing the wall at an angle (with the default trilinear filtering they get extremely blurred starting at a viewing angle of ~45 deg)
